text:
Mr* Frank Schooley
October 2, 1952
Page 2
I have one inquiry out concerning Earl and should hear from
that within a few days. In the meantime, distribute your findings
as soon as they are in to Allen, Burton, Dick,Si*, Wilbur and me.
You may be interested to know, incidentally, that I talked with
Allen and he agrees that we should get the committee together
to talk to Vfynn but that we should not include him because of the
distance#
I appreciate your good work and your comments concerning the
other three men as well as comments concerning the meeting of
this committee prior to the November convention.
My kindest regards always.
Sincerely yours.
Radio Broadcasting Services
Manager, WUOA(FM)
>n Ausmus, Director
GA:pse
